page.title: 08NESSCLIFFE POSTOFFICE
page.content: At the shop in Nesscliffe they don't sell everything you would find if you went to Kwik Save or any other supermarket but they do have most things. At the shop they sell sweets and ice lollies, biscuits, bottles of lemonade and milk. They also have fresh things like sausages and margarine. The shop is next to a hairdressers. On Mondays, Tuesdays, Thursdays and Fridays the shop is open till 5.3Opm. On Wednesdays and Saturdays the shop is open till lpm. On Sundays the shop is not open at all. You can get stamps and post letters because it is also a Post Office. Ist class stamps cost l7p and 2nd class l3p. People in the village can also get their pensions, child and unemployment benefits. It is also the Giro Bank.
